Void_Verdict.help: PBAoE Extreme DMG(Negative Energy). Recharge: Very Long.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Void_Core_Verdict.help: PBAoE Extreme DMG(Negative Energy). Recharge: Very Long. Has a chance to do additional damage to Pet, Minion, and Lieutenant class foes.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Void_Radial_Verdict.help: PBAoE Extreme DMG(Negative Energy). Recharge: Very Long. Significantly reduces the damage of affected targets for a short time.
Void_Radial_Verdict.targetHelp: The Void Judgement can cripple the damage of affected foes, and sometimes produce a massive shockwave which knocks them back.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Ion_Total_Core_Verdict.help: Chain Ranged AoE, Extreme DMG(Energy). Recharge: Very Long. Has a chance to do additional damage to all foes. This ability can hit up to 31 targets.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Ion_Partial_Core_Verdict.help: Chain Ranged AoE, Extreme DMG(Energy). Recharge: Very Long. Has a chance to do additional damage to Pet, Minion, and Lieutenant class foes. Drains endurance and debuffs the recovery of affected targets. This ability can hit up to 31 targets.
Ion_Partial_Core_Verdict.shortHelp: Chain Ranged AoE, Extreme DMG(Energy), Foe -End, -Recovery
Ion_Partial_Core_Verdict.targetHelp: The Ion Judgement can drain its targets of endurance or even trap them in an electrostatic field.

Cryonic_Partial_Radial_Verdict.help: Long Ranged Cone, Extreme DMG (Cold). Recharge: Very Long. Significantly slows the movement speed and recharge rate of affected targets.
Cryonic_Partial_Radial_Verdict.shortHelp: Long Ranged Cone, Extreme DMG (Cold), Foe -Speed, -Recharge
Cryonic_Partial_Radial_Verdict.targetHelp: The Cryonic Judgement can slow its targets or even freeze them solid.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Cryonic_Total_Radial_Verdict.help: Ranged Cone, Extreme DMG (Cold). Recharge: Very Long. Significantly slows the movement speed and recharge rate of affected targets. Has a chance to freeze affected foes in a block of ice.
Cryonic_Total_Radial_Verdict.shortHelp: Ranged Cone, Extreme DMG (Cold), Foe -Speed, -Recharge, Chance for Hold
Cryonic_Total_Radial_Verdict.targetHelp: The Cryonic Judgement can slow its targets or even freeze them solid.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Pyronic_Core_Final_Verdict.help: Targeted Wide Ranged AoE, Extreme DMG(Fire) + Superior DoT(Fire). Recharge: Very Long.
Pyronic_Core_Final_Verdict.shortHelp: Targeted Wide Ranged AoE, Extreme DMG(Fire) + Superior DoT(Fire)
Pyronic_Core_Final_Verdict.targetHelp: The Pyronic Judgement burns with a long-lasting fire, and the initial overpressure can even disorient foes.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

Vorpal_Radial_Final_Verdict.help: Self-Targeted Wide Cone AoE, Extreme DMG(Smashing), Self +Defense(All) Recharge: Very Long. This power does not require a target. When used, it will hit in a cone in front of the player, regardless of what entity is currently selected.
Vorpal_Radial_Final_Verdict.shortHelp: Self-Targeted Wide Cone AoE, Extreme DMG(Smashing), Self +Defense(All)
Vorpal_Radial_Final_Verdict.targetHelp: The Vorpal Judgement strikes with surreal precision, often causing lingering wounds, and the rapidity of motion can make the user harder to hit for a short time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
